name: Astrohunter
description:
Entry for the Human Academy Game Jam (jan 2022) - with A Snake In Space as graphist

AstroHunter

Who knows what lies in the outer space ? What if monsters would fight in epic battles while we're here, wondering if our planet is the only place that shelters life ?

You may live one of those here ! Take a battle in space against multiples waves of enemies, but be careful not to get overwhelmed by them !

Controls
  • WASD / arrows : moving the character
  • Left click : shoot lasers
